sentences.english: In SCB, dancing in the new year eve celerbration also.
sentences.chinese: 深圳渣打银行新年除夕晚会，舞蹈表演。

sentences.english: BEA (Bank of East Asia) and SCB (Standard Chartered Bank) are also planning to set branches in Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 东亚银行和渣打银行也正准备入驻湖南。

sentences.english: Standard Chartered has offered wine tastings and luxury-goods promotions.
sentences.chinese: 渣打银行提供的是葡萄酒品尝以及高档商品促销活动。
